      • findAdminApplication

        public static <any> findAdminApplication(DAO sql,
                                         PropertyBean propertyBean,
                                         ApplicationBean application,
                                         Paging paging)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the administrative applications. It is possible to filter by property.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        propertyBean - property filter
        application - application filter
        Returns:
        list of administrative applications found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findAdminEntitlementsByApplication

        public static <any> findAdminEntitlementsByApplication(DAO sql,
                                                       EntitlementBean entitlement,
                                                       ApplicationBean application,
                                                       Paging paging)
                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the administrative entitlements associated to the application given. It is possible to filter by entitlement.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        entitlement - entitlement filter
        application - application filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of administrative entitlements found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findEntitlementByOrgUnit

        public static <any> findEntitlementByOrgUnit(DAO sql,
                                             boolean hierarchy,
                                             EntitlementBean entitlement,
                                             OrgUnitBean orgUnit,
                                             ApplicationBean application,
                                             Paging paging)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the administrative entitlements associated to the application given and the organization unit given. It is possible to filter by entitlement. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to extend the search to the children of the organization unit given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to extend the search to the children of the organization unit given
        entitlement - entitlement filter
        orgUnit - organization unit filter, if null it is used the root organization unit
        application - application filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of administrative entitlements found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • insertAdminApplication

        public static ApplicationBean insertAdminApplication(DAO sql,
                                                     ApplicationBean applicationBean)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        The method inserts the administrative application given.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        applicationBean - application to insert, mandatory
        Returns:
        application inserted
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
